WRITING.TEXT: Not a bug but when downloading apps, I used to get to see the speed of download in Android M but it only shows time remaining and not speed in N.

I think my battery has gone pretty bad.. with Pokemon go on and with 1 amp charging(USB) the phone is still discharging instead of charging. basically just decreasing the rate of discharge. The default phone app takes longer than usual to pop up. Some apps have become slower to open instead of being faster. Android N has better features n cleaner look but I feel like Im compromising on my battery and some of the performance.

WRITING.TITLE: Android apps that help in making you Pokemon Master.
WRITING.TEXT: Whenever I see screenshots these days I see that there's an overlay of someother app on it. What app are you guys using? and please tell me some apps on Playstore that I can use for helping me organise or do better at Pokemon go. Thanks! :)
By "randomly beeping every 5 mins" I mean, It randomly starts i.e. doesn't happen always but starts out of the blue and then continues to beep every 5 mins.
Nope. NFC is off and I dont have a NFC card around.

WRITING.TITLE: OP3 randomly beeping after every 5 mins
WRITING.TEXT: My OP3 gives out a single short beep( it sounds like the beep when someone's on a life support). No apps are running in the background and Im on OOS 3.2.8. I started noticing it since the past 3-4 days.
Can I wrap a washing machine with this method? I'm gifting a washing machine to my parents.
Yeah, Wehn Henning always cracks me up. "Missing" one was his best one for sure. A close 2nd to Kevin Bridges's Horse.

WRITING.TITLE: I see your Bob Mortimer's split apple with bare hands and I raise you this (Kevin Bridges horse riding in Bulgaria)
